Docs.summary: This class provides methods to get a specific service objective by using its ID or to List all of the service objectives on a server.

Docs.param: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server to be queried.
The Id of the Service Objective to be obtained.
Docs.summary: Returns information about a certain Service Objective with a specific Id.
Docs.returns: Response containing the service objective for a given Azure SQL Database Server with matching service objective Id.

Docs.param: The name of the Azure SQL Database Server to be queried.
Docs.summary: Returns information about all Service Objectives on an Azure SQL Database Server.
Docs.returns: Response containing the list of service objective for a given server. This is returnedfrom a call to List Service Objectives.
